pr_title: Move 'MoveValidator' and 'AirMoveValidator' to their own package

timeline.message:
Move 'MoveValidator' and 'AirMoveValidator' to their own package

Helps organize classes in the delegate package and paves way for
move validation classes to later be broken up into helper classes
with package-visibility.
